Summary: Validate signup with valid username & password for unregistered user
Description: Ensure that System shows a confirmation Alert message: "Sign up successful."after new visitors register using a unique username and valid password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying SignUp pop-up
2. User should be unregistered
Steps:
1.Enter valid Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on signup button
Expected Result: System shows a confirmation Alert  message: "Sign up successful."
Actual Result: System shows a confirmation Alert  message: "Sign up successful."

Summary: Validate signup with existing username & valid password
Description: System shows an Alert  message: "This user already exists." after new visitors register using a used username and valid password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying SignUp pop-up
2. User should be unregistered
Steps:
1.Enter invalid Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on signup button
Expected Result: System shows an Alert  message: "This user already exists."
Actual Result: System shows an Alert  message: "This user already exists."

Summary: Validate signup with blank username & valid password
Description: System shows an Alert  message: "Please fill out Username and Password." after new visitors register entered a valid password and empty username.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying SignUp pop-up
2. User should be unregistered
Steps:
1.Enter empty Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on signup button
Expected Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."
Actual Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."

Summary: Validate signup with valid username & blank password
Description: System shows an Alert  message: "Please fill out Username and Password." after new visitors register entered a valid username and empty password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying SignUp pop-up
2. User should be unregistered
Steps:
1.Enter valid Username
2.Enter empty password
3.click on signup button
Expected Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."
Actual Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."

Summary: Validate signup with both fields blank
Description: System shows an Alert  message: "Please fill out Username and Password." after new visitors register leave the username and password empty.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying SignUp pop-up
2. User should be unregistered
Steps:
1.leave Username empty
2.leave password empty
3.click on signup button
Expected Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."
Actual Result: System shows an Alert says: "Please fill out Username and Password."

Summary: Validate login with valid username & password
Description: Ensure that the system responds to that login of  registered users when he  log in using correct username and password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying login pop-up
2. User should be registered
Steps:
1.Enter valid Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on login button
Expected Result:
1.System should refresh the page 
2.make login and signup buttons invisible 
3.show the username for the signed user
Actual Result:
1.System should refresh the page 
2.make login and signup buttons invisible 
3.show the username for the signed user

Summary: Validate login with invalid username& valid password
Description: System show error: "User does not exist." after login of  registered users when he  log in using invalid username and valid password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying login pop-up
2. User should be registered
Steps:
1.Enter invalid Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on login button
Expected Result: System show error: "User does not exist."
Actual Result: System show error: "User does not exist."

Summary: Validate login with invalid password & valid username
Description: System show error: "Wrong password." after login of  registered users when he  log in using valid username and invalid password.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying login pop-up
2. User should be registered
Steps:
1.Enter valid Username
2.Enter invalid password
3.click on login button

Summary: Validate login with blank username or password
Description: System show error: "Please fill out Username and Password" after login of  registered users with empty username and password fields.
Pre Conditions:
1. User is desplaying login pop-up
2. User should be registered
Steps:
1.Enter empty Username
2.Enter valid password
3.click on login button
Expected Result: System show error: "Please fill out Username and Password"
Actual Result: System show error: "Please fill out Username and Password"

Summary: Validate logout from the home page
Description: Ensure that the system responds to that logout of signed users when he  log in using correct username and password.
Pre Conditions: User is logged in on homepage
Steps: 1.click on logout button in the top of the page
Expected Result:
1.System should refresh the page 
2.make login and signup buttons visible again
3.Remove the username from the top of the page
Actual Result:
1.System should refresh the page 
2.make login and signup buttons visible again
3.Remove the username from the top of the page

Summary: Validate adding a product to cart
Description: System shows success Alert "Product added" after shopper add a product to the cart from product details or category.
Pre Conditions: User is logged in or browsing as guest
Steps:
1. click on a product
2. system should navigate to the item Page
3.click on add to cart button

Summary: Validate cart contents after adding product
Description: Ensure product details are correct in the cart after adding them.
Pre Conditions:
1.Product has been added to cart
2. you are in the item page
Steps:
1. click on cart button in the top of the page 
2. system should navigate to the cart page
3. observe the descriptions that should changes after adding one product
Expected Result: Cart should display correct Title, Price, and Quantity = 1.
Actual Result: Cart should display correct Title, Price, and Quantity = 1.

Summary: Validate multiple different products in the cart
Description: Ensure cart supports multiple different products by showing the entire list.
Pre Conditions:
1.multi Products have been added to cart
2. you are in the item page
Steps:
1. click on cart button in the top of the page 
2. system should navigate to the cart page
3. observe the descriptions that should changes after adding multiple products
Expected Result: Cart should list all added products with correct details and prices.
Actual Result: Cart should list all added products with correct details and prices.

Summary: Validate removing a single product from cart
Description: Ensure The selected product should no longer appear in the cart, and total price updates after shopper removes one product from the cart.
Pre Conditions:
1.multi Products have been added to cart
2. you are in the cart page
Steps:
1.click on the delete button that is in the same row of the product you want to remove
2.obseve the changes that must be done
Expected Result: The selected product should no longer appear in the cart, and total price updates.
Actual Result: The selected product should no longer appear in the cart, and total price updates.

Summary: Validate removing all products at once
Description: Ensure Cart should show as empty, and total price should reset to NON after shopper emptys the cart completely by deleting all items.
Steps:
1.click on the delete button that is in the same row of the product you want to remove untill its empty
2.obseve the changes that must be done
Expected Result: Cart should show as empty, and total price should reset to NON.
Actual Result: Cart should show as empty, and total price should reset to NON.
